vulnerability: The mintToken function does not check if the recipient address is a contract address. This could lead to potential security vulnerabilities.
The transferFrom function does not check if the sender has sufficient allowance to transfer the specified amount of tokens.
The burn function does not check if the sender has sufficient balance to burn the specified amount of tokens.
The burnFrom function does not check if the sender has sufficient allowance to burn the specified amount of tokens.
The distributeToken function does not check if the sender has sufficient balance to distribute the specified amount of tokens.
